title:
NG0505: No hydration info is present in server response.

伺服器端給出的響應中沒有出現水合資訊
contents:
mode_edit

NG0505: No hydration info is present in server response. 伺服器端給出的響應中沒有出現水合資訊link

說明link

Descriptionlink

當在客戶端啟用水合時，如果伺服器給出的響應中不包含有關水合邏輯所要求的特殊序列化資訊，就會發生本錯誤。

This error occurs when hydration is enabled on the client, but the server response doesn't contain special serialized information about the application that hydration logic relies on.

如果應用程式的客戶端配置中包含了 provideClientHydration() 函式，但在伺服器端配置中卻沒有相應的資訊，就會發生這種情況。

This can happen when the provideClientHydration() function is included in the client part of the application configuration, but is missing in the server part of the configuration.

在具有預設專案結構（由 ng new 產生）的應用程式中，應該將 provideClientHydration() 呼叫新增到主 AppModule 的 providers 陣列中（主模組會匯入到伺服器端模組中）或那些會同時包含在客戶端配置和伺服器端配置中的提供者陣列中。

In applications with the default project structure (generated by the ng new), the provideClientHydration() call is added either into the providers array of the main AppModule (which is imported into the server module) or into a set of providers that are included into both client and server configurations.

如果你有自訂設定，其中客戶端和伺服器配置是彼此獨立的並且不共享共用的提供者陣列，請確保也把 provideClientHydration() 包含在用於在伺服器上引導應用程式的提供者陣列中。

If you have a custom setup where client and server configuration are independent and do not share common set of providers, make sure that the provideClientHydration() is also included into the set of providers used to bootstrap an application on the server.

有關水合的更多資訊，請參閱本指南。

More information about hydration can be found in this guide.


如何排除本錯誤link

Debugging the errorlink

驗證 provideClientHydration() 呼叫是否包含在一組用於在伺服器上引導應用程式的提供者中。

Verify that the provideClientHydration() call is included into a set of providers that is used to bootstrap an application on the server.
